# Flip Garden

## About
Flip Garden is a free visual portfolio showcase for card collectors. Collectors can display their Pokemon, Sports, Yu-Gi-Oh, Magic: The Gathering, and any other TCG collections in a beautiful digital garden format.

## Features
- Visual Portfolio: Display cards in stunning visual grids with high-res images and custom layouts
- Collection Value Tracker: Real-time market data showing individual card values and total portfolio trends
- Public Showcase Pages: Shareable public pages for every collector
- Discovery Feed: Browse collections from collectors worldwide
- Trade Connections: Connect with other collectors for trades and networking
- Rarity Badges: Automatic rarity classification (Holo, Ultra Rare, Secret Rare, etc.)

## Pricing
Free to use. Optional premium themes available later for extra customization.

## Card Types Supported
Pokemon TCG, Sports Cards, Yu-Gi-Oh, Magic: The Gathering, and any other trading card game.
